description:
Stylish crops for spin classes or weekend rides. These comfy crops make time in the saddle even more enjoyable. With a high waist band, they feature a female specific chamois and soft materials for superb comfort on any ride.

  • Select Transfer fabric is soft and moisture wicking with mesh panels for added breathability
  • Flat waistband is wide and high with encased elastic for a slip-free fit
  • Female specific Select Escape 1:1® Chamois improves comfort in the saddle
  • Stretch mesh pocket on the right thigh fits most phones
  • BioViz® reflective details
name: Pearl Izumi Sugar Cropped Pants - Women's
